casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Anthony JOHNSON Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 31, 2018

Emily Wagner, assistant public defender, in support of the petition.

Jennifer F. Miller, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn. App. 490, 179 A.3d 780 (2017), is denied.

KAHN, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
